hedline.hl1: BKN Will Close Down Its Media Services Unit

abstract.p: BKN Media in Chicago, the media services division of BKN, is closing (S)

block.p: BKN Media in Chicago, the media services division of BKN, is being closed.

Allen Bohbot, chairman and chief executive at BKN in New York, confirmed a report about the closing this week in Adweek. He said the company wanted to focus on its much larger children's entertainment and production businesses. Most of the 40 employees of BKN Media will be laid off, he said.
BKN Media in Chicago, the media services division of BKN, is being closed.

Allen Bohbot, chairman and chief executive at BKN in New York, confirmed a report about the closing this week in Adweek. He said the company wanted to focus on its much larger children's entertainment and production businesses. Most of the 40 employees of BKN Media will be laid off, he said.

Joyce Pemberton, a spokeswoman at Montgomery Ward in Chicago, BKN Media's largest client, with billings estimated at $75 million, would not say if the company would name a replacement or begin a review.
